extensionDescription.message: Extracts events from emails using local AI (Ollama) and registers them to CalDAV.

promptNote.message: * Variables like {{subject}} are replaced by the code.

saveError.message: Failed to save. Please check the JSON format of the calendar list.

errorLoadSettings.message: Failed to load initial settings. Please try reloading the add-on.

noCalendarWarning.message: Please register a calendar in settings

confirmResetPrompt.message: This will reset the prompt to the default for your current language. Are you sure?

defaultAiPrompt.message:
You are an engine that extracts event information from emails.

Constraints:
- Output MUST be JSON only.
- No Markdown, No explanations.
- Use 24-hour format for time.

Output format (JSON only):
{
  "title": "Event Title",
  "start": "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM",
  "end": "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM",
  "location": "Location",
  "description": "Description",
  "confidence": "high|medium|low"
}

Email Date: {{date}}

Subject:
{{subject}}

Body:
{{body}}

From:
{{from}}

Example:
Email Date: Dec 30, 2025
Body: "Jan 13th, 12:45 - 14:15"
â†’ start="2026-01-13T12:45" end="2026-01-13T14:15"
